content.text:
In the EPF Complete Port Enabled state, the controller has completed Emergency Power Fail Processing.
The port is enabled.
Transitions out of this state are defined in Figure 727.

tables.title: Table_8_2_5_1_8_EPF_Complete_Port_Enabled_State
tables.table_md:
| State Transitions | | Transition Condition | | :--- | :--- | :--- | | Starting | Ending | | | EPF Complete Port Enabled | PLS Not Ready | • The controller processes a Controller Level Reset; or
• CSTS.SHST is not cleared to 00b. |
